original_text: The God of the people of Israel chose our ancestors to be his people. While they lived in Egypt, God caused his people to become a very large group. They lived as foreign people in Egypt. But God used his great power to bring them out from that country.
korean_text: 이 이스라엘 백성의 하나님이 우리 조상들을 택하시고 애굽 땅에서 나그네 된 그 백성을 높여 큰 권능으로 인도하여 내사

sentences.original_text: The God of the people of Israel
God caused his people to become
They lived as foreign people in Egypt
But God used his great power
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님께서는 그 큰 권능을 사용하셔서

sentences.original_text: to bring them out from that country
